replies.body:
Your mastery points make me like you without even having met you.
Well played.

Ew, you have level 7 Yorick.

Please do us all a favour and **accidentally** fall off a bridge.

WAIT!!! You play Nasus, maybe there is still some hope left for you...

i play ap nasus mid/supp with a pretty solid k/d/a and winrate, barely played the meta nasus( like 4 times and lost all 4 times)

i also have rarely played the new yorick and got m7 from playing old yorick support. in 2 weeks of hardcore spamming i went from lvl 2 to m7 getting 6/10/41, my personal best on any support and rarely ever not getting an s score.fun times. (RIP my friend)

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EJRXt9gA,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-02-03T17:40:31.636+0000)
>
> i play ap nasus mid/supp with a pretty solid k/d/a and winrate, barely played the meta nasus( like 4 times and lost all 4 times)
> 
> i also have rarely played the new yorick and got m7 from playing old yorick support. in 2 weeks of hardcore spamming i went from lvl 2 to m7 getting 6/10/41, my personal best on any support and rarely ever not getting an s score.fun times. (RIP my friend)

Oh yeah, old yorick was so much fun. People totally underestimated him and it was great when they got pummelled to death by his ghouls. But this new yorick is just a cancer slowly killing off top lane.
I cried when I saw Urgot having the highest champion mastery, boasting a mastery lvl 7 at 225k points in your profile.
